channel.title: How do I pack 474 or 525 anims/gfx?
channel.description: Does anyone know how to Pack 474 anims/gfx or 525.. I need to pack them into my server so the skillcape emotes will work.. But I'm not the best with client sided so I wouldn't know where to start anyone mind helping me out?
